name: Startread Slippers
data: It increases the users wisdom superbly.
It has average armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration adequately.
This item loses its magical powers slowly.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'mercury lore'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'jupiter lore'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'neptune lore'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'venus lore'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'sun lore'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'saturn lore'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'uranus lore'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'mars lore'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'pluto lore'.
The slippers attune the wearer to the cosmos, enhancing the effects
